metadata.title: Proteinases Involved in Plant Virus Genome Expression

abstract.original_text: product but also regulate its activity or subcellular localization by removal of functional domains.

sentences.segment_text: product but also regulate its activity or subcellular localization by removal of functional domains .

abstract.original_text: Genes of alphalike, carmolike, and sobemolike viruses are expressed through different combinations of strategies acting at the level of transcription (synthesis of subgenomic (sg) RNAs) and/or translation (alternative translation initiation sites, frameshifting, and readthrough at suppressible termination codons). In some cases, gene expression is completed posttranslationally by proteolysis mediated by a virus-encoded proteinase.

sentences.segment_text: and sobemolike viruses are expressed through different combinations of strategies acting at the level of transcription ( synthesis of subgenomic ( sg ) RNAs ) and/or translation ( alternative translation initiation sites , frameshifting , and readthrough at suppressible termination codons ) .
In some cases , gene expression is completed posttranslationally by proteolysis mediated by a virus-encoded proteinase .

abstract.original_text: Proteolytic processing of protein precursors has also been observed in plant pararetroviruses. These viruses have double-stranded (ds) DNA genomes that replicate via RNA intermediates (Hohn and FOtterer, 1997). In this case, the virus-encoded proteinase belongs to the aspartic family and a host cysteine proteinase seems to be involved in the maturation of a viral protein.

sentences.segment_text: Proteolytic processing of protein precursors has also been observed in plant pararetroviruses .
These viruses have double-stranded ( ds ) DNA genomes that replicate via RNA intermediates ( Hohn and FOtterer , 1997 ) .
In this case , the virus-encoded proteinase belongs to the aspartic family and a host cysteine proteinase seems to be involved in the maturation of a viral protein .

abstract.original_text: Here, we have attempted to give an overall view of the use of proteolytic processing by different plant virus groups for the expression of their genomes.

sentences.segment_text: Here , we have attempted to give an overall view of the use of proteolytic processing by different plant virus groups for the expression of their genomes .
